content:
Wassertheil family

1 Izrael WASSERTHEIL
 + Elli                              (Wolf)
  2x (Dawid) Leibel WASSERTHAL       1812-13
    + Ester LEFLER                   1810-13 - Jul 29, 1875 #217
          married Nov 13, 1834 #81
     3x Abraham Moyzesz WASSERTHAL   1835 #509 - 1835 #369
     3x son WASSERTHAL               Jan 5, 1837 #8 - 1837 #25

     3x Izaak Aron WASSERTHAL        Jul 10, 1840 #323
       + Anna                        1855
        4x Jakob WASSERTHAL          Nov 1, 1874 Czestochowa
     3o Sara Reisel (Rozalia) WASSERTHAL  1843 #208 - before husband
       * Chaim /Efrojm Salomon LOFFLER  Mar 15, 1842 Chrzanow
             married Mar 27, 1868 #13
        4o Lieba LOFFLER             Apr-May 1869 - Aug 14, 1869 #330
        4o Charlotta (Salomea) LOFFLER  Mar 6, 1870 #176
          * Jozef WECHSEL            Feb-Mar 1860 New York
                married Nov 13, 1890 #118
        4o Regina LOFFLER            Apr 9/27, 1872 #267
          * Jozef Eliasz GRIFFEL     Dec 1861 Krakow
                married Mar 15, 1896 #37
              FAMILY LISTING

          * Ferdynand ZIFFER         Mar 2, 1882 Podgorze
                married Jun 20, 1909 #126
     3x Jakob Salomon WASSERTHAL     Sep 5, 1845 #503 - 1846 #93

 + Ruchy GOLDSCHMIED

        4o Bronislawa WASSERTHEIL    Sep 24, 1897 Podgorze
        4x Dawid WASSERTHEIL         Feb 26, 1899 Podgorze - after 1940
          + Feiga PLOTEK             Sep 10, 1911 Proszowice, Miechow - after 1940

       + Neche SINAJ                 May 1861 Nowy Sacz

             banns 1920 #282  uncle-niece




     Jakob WASSERTHAL                1816-17 - before 1870
